name: Heroes Chronicles: Warlords of the Wasteland
name_original: Heroes Chronicles: Warlords of the Wasteland
description:
Heroes Chronicles: Warlords of the Wasteland is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It was originally released in 2000. Бука published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Heroes Chronicles: Warlords of the Wasteland on PC.
